This function will get the font currently assigned for drawing text. The function will return -1 if no font is set, or the ID value (a positive integer) for the font resource assigned.
The above code will check to see which font is being used for drawing and if it's not <tt>fnt_MainMenu</tt>, then the font and draw colour are set before some text is drawn to the screen.
